mapper.sql: CATEGORY_OID, CATEGORY_DESC, MONTHLY_BUDGET, CATEGORY_LEVEL, IS_LEAF, PARENT_OID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, SEQ_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY(CATEGORY_DESC, MONTHLY_BUDGET, CATEGORY_LEVEL, IS_LEAF, PARENT_OID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY) VALUES (#{categoryDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{monthlyBudget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BIT}, #{parentOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE CATEGORY
SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1,
CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
MONTHLY_BUDGET = #{monthlyBudget,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CATEGORY_LEVEL = #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_OID = #{parentOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR_OID = #{creatorOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
WHERE CATEGORY_OID = #{categoryOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE CATEGORY SET SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1, CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, MONTHLY_BUDGET = #{monthlyBudget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATEGORY_LEVEL = #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENT_OID = #{parentOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR_OID = #{creatorOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} WHERE CATEGORY_OID = #{categoryOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
